name: Way of the Samurai 4 - Scroll Set
detailed_description:
DLC Bundle Scroll Set contains the following items:

A set of scrolls for advanced skills. Includes Special Moves Scroll x10 and Legendary Moves Scroll x10.
*Each purchase only applies once per savedata.
*If inventory is full, free up space and speak to the specter in the cemetery.
